body.name: Citrus Magic Pet Odor Absorbing Solid Air Freshener for Home, Air Purifier, Fresh Citrus, Must have Pet Supplies, 8 Oz (Pack of 3)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 12 hrs 4 mins
features: Extra Strength: Fresh citrus fragrance is an odor eliminator for strong odors of pets
All Pets: Ideal for Carpet Odors, Musty Smells, Pet Odors, Litter Box Odors, Pet Beds, Cage Odors, Poop Odors
Long Lasting: Will absorb odors in 350 sq. ft. areas for 6-8 weeks
Unique Formula: Includes Baking Soda to provide convenient, continuous odor control in touch places
No Harsh Chemicals: Propellants, Formaldehyde, Benzene, Phthalates, Parabens, SLS/SLES, Ethyhaxnol
body.description: Be greeted by your pet, not their odors! Keep your home smelling clean with Citrus Magic Pet Solid Air Fresheners. They absorb even the toughest pet odors using a unique formula with baking soda and powerful odor eliminators, and leave a fresh, clean scent. Use for continuous freshening in problem areas like litter boxes, pet areas, pet cages, and many more. They work hard to fight tough pet odors for weeks. Convenient, continuous odor control, 24/7. Citrus Magic has created a line of pet odor eliminating products that promote a safe and natural, yet effective alternative to using harsh chemicals around those beloved members of any family.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Citrus Magic Pet Odor Absorbing Solid Air Freshener, Fresh Citrus, 8-Ounce, Pack of 3 Be greeted by your pet, not their odors! Keep your home smelling clean with Citrus Magic Pet Solid Air Fresheners. They absorb even the toughest pet odors using a unique formula with baking soda and powerful odor eliminators, and leave a fresh, clean scent. Use for continuous freshening in problem areas like litter boxes, pet areas, pet cages, and many more. They work hard to fight tough pet odors for weeks. Convenient, continuous odor control, 24/7. Citrus Magic has created a line of pet odor eliminating products that promote a safe and natural, yet effective alternative to using harsh chemicals around those beloved members of any family.

Citrus Magic Pet Citrus Magic began its story 30 years ago with a 100% Natural Odor Eliminating, Non-Aerosol, Citrus Spray Air Freshener. Understanding what consumers are looking for, Citrus Magic has worked to produce safe, naturally-based products, free from harsh chemicals, that effectively work at eliminating odors, freshening the air and maintaining a clean environment at home, at work, or even during travel. Citrus Magic strives to maintain the highest level of natural possible while still creating effective, and great smelling, products for your home. Experience the Magic!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing Odor Control
reviews.reviewText: Works excellently near a litter box for a sick cat. Buying more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Pet Odor Eater
reviews.reviewText: I have a litter robot and one cat. The litter robot occasionally gets a little smelly. This eats the remaining odors to make sure the area smells decent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Got these for our cats room. It smells good but it is t very strong: bad to put out 2

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Packaging somehow an issue
reviews.reviewText: This is a solid air freshener. I’m not sure how, but the inside of the plastic, the containers and even the envelope it came in were all damp from it leaking. Scent is good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Has a fresh scent
reviews.reviewText: I put these around my apartment to keep it smelling fresh. I have 5 cats and am a rescuer so i clean the litter boxes several times a day and people come in and don't know I have cats, so I can't comment on getting rid of litterbox odor, as this is a recent purchase, but it does keep my bedroom and bathroom smelling fresh and clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does NOT smell citrusy
reviews.reviewText: Disgusting smell. Came leaking and not at all smelling like citrus. Bad buy. Giving the others away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These work so well. I have a litter box in the basement. My family room is near the basement door. Sometimes after the cat uses the litter the smell is slightly noticeable in the family room from it creeping up the basement stairs and under the door. I placed one by the litter box and one on the top step to the basement and I haven’t smelled litter in months. I now have these on auto replenish every 6 weeks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Frequently arrives damaged
reviews.reviewText: Fantastic product, keeps the litter box area from smelling too bad, lasts about two weeks and is only $3ish each.When it doesn't arrive damaged. The lid is very easy to pop off and the contents will spill out into the packaging, I put this on subscribe and save because I liked the product, but after having three out of five deliveries arrive ruined, It's not worth the return process when the next one is just going to arrive destroyed as well. Try to find it locally, because it is a good product but do not buy from amazon, it is too easily damaged in shipping
It works at least a bit
some oil leaked when I got it. expensive but it works
Expensive but expecting it is safe for my fur kids.Smells bit artificialAnd oil was leaked outside.
